attributes.action: we would loke a cull on birds of prey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like a petition to cull birds of prey as they kill lots of small birds and there are now too many of them without any  constriction on breeding

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
